title: Kagi Assistant is now available to all users
author: angilr
aiHeadline: Kagi Assistant finally opens its doors to the masses, sparing the rest of us from the agony of waiting for our invite, which apparently was just a cruel joke all along.

title: Intuit, Owner of TurboTax, Wins Battle Against America's Taxpayers
author: leotravis10
aiHeadline: Intuit, the folks behind TurboTax, wins the battle against America's taxpayers, proving once again that when it comes to taxes, the only winners are the ones who made the rules.

title: Show HN: I made a Doom-like game fit inside a QR code
author: kuberwastaken
aiHeadline: Show HN: A developer's latest masterpiece is a Doom-like game so tiny it can fit inside a QR code, because clearly, the world needed another reason to pull out their phones and scan random squares.

title: Defold: cross-platform game engine
author: xd
aiHeadline: Defold, the cross-platform game engine, is here to save your life if you're into making games that can run on everything from your grandma's tablet to your high-end gaming PC, because why not?

title: Judge Rules Blanket Search of Cell Tower Data Unconstitutional
author: bradac56
aiHeadline: In a landmark decision, a judge rules that blanket searches of cell tower data are unconstitutional, giving us all a rare moment of hope that maybe, just maybe, our privacy isn't completely gone.
